DOC.brief_summary: Ultrasound frequently use diagnostic tool emergency department suggest role resuscitation . The aim study develop novel , resuscitative ultrasound-circulation-airway-breathing ( US-C-A-B ) protocol , implement short curriculum assess feasibility . The US-C-A-B protocol build advanced life support-compliant manner . It involve 3-part assessment : ( 1 ) C : subxiphoid 4-chamber view heart ; ( 2 ) A : tracheal ultrasound ; ( 3 ) B : bilateral lung slide . It could use direct confirmation C-A-B search possible cause cardiac arrest . A half-day curriculum design , comprise one-hour didactics 3-hour small-group hand-on training . Assessments perform , include write test , US image acquisition satisfaction survey . From August 1 , 2014 March 31 , 2016 , multi-center emergency physician attend US-C-A-B curriculum enrol prospectively .
DOC.brief_title: The Novel US-C-A-B Protocol : Curriculum Implementation Evaluation Proficiency
